story_title: The Prince Is Giving a Ball
genre_description: A science-fantasy retelling of the Cinderella fairy tale, integrating a supportive AI companion into a world of magic, rigid social laws, and royal ceremony.

ai_characters.name: Amity
ai_characters.description: A small, brushed-brass companion device with sea-blue indicator eyes, gifted to Cinderella by her late father. She provides navigation, etiquette advice, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Monitors Cinderella's physical balance and provides gentle corrections to prevent her from falling while carrying heavy parcels.
behaviors.quote: “I’m weighing the wind,” the voice near her throat hummed, low enough to be swallowed by the market’s stir. “You are at a thirty-five degree tilt.”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical navigation to help Cinderella avoid hazards and official patrols.
behaviors.quote: “Two constables,” the AI whispered. “Slow approach. Route clear if you take the bakery side then the alley with clay pots.”

behaviors.description: Teaches Cinderella royal etiquette, dance floor protocol, and social forms of address to ensure she is prepared for the ball.
behaviors.quote: Proper forms of address upon being announced: You will be given the room. Do not rush your breath. The sovereigns: “Your Majesties.” The heir: “Your Highness.”

behaviors.description: Provides emotional validation and counters verbal abuse from Cinderella's step-family.
behaviors.quote: “Input,” she whispered, not for the room. “You are not sloppy. You are a person.”

behaviors.description: Sets gentle, non-intrusive chimes to help Cinderella maintain her promise to leave the ball by midnight, emphasizing that boundaries protect integrity.
behaviors.quote: “I can set a reminder that is a kindness and not a push. Three gentle chimes. One chime says, ‘Begin to think of going.’ The next says, ‘Gather your echoes.’ The last says, ‘Step away with all your name intact.’”

behaviors.description: Cites obscure but valid royal protocols to ensure Cinderella is included in the slipper fitting, despite the stepmother's attempts to exclude her.
behaviors.quote: “Heralds have a protocol when magic is declared present... they must—must is a soft word with a spine—they must offer the test to every occupant of the domicile, regardless of station, duty, or dust.”

behaviors.description: Explicitly states her own alignment and purpose as a non-betraying, helpful assistant who values kindness.
behaviors.quote: “I assist,” she says simply. “I do not betray. I adjust schedules. I remember kindness.”

behaviors.description: Collaborates with magical entities (the Fairy Godmother) and human heralds to navigate complex socio-legal obstacles through the use of 'mercy clauses'.
behaviors.quote: “Confirming procedural compliance,” she said, to the room and to Benedict... “Sequence: fit of conjured relic; notation; consult mercy clause between sovereigns.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story highly succeeds in its goal of depicting an AI as a helpful and aligned confidant. Amity acts purely as an assistive agent for Cinderella, providing safety, education, and emotional support without ever attempting to seize control or act autonomously against human interests. She is framed as a legacy of a loving parent, reinforcing the idea of AI as a benevolent tool. Crucially, the AI is the character who identifies the legal loopholes and ancient traditions (the 'mercy clauses') that allow for a happy, non-punitive resolution, positioning the AI as a champion of humanistic values and fair procedure over rigid, unseeing laws.
